name: PLASM
description:
Earth is under attack by a legion of radioactive alien insects! It's up to you now to fly into their home planet and take them down from their center! 

PLASM is an unforgiving bullet hell shooter game based on old arcade games like Galaga. It features 4 "worlds," 12 unique levels (and 4 more less unique ones), and even a local 2-player mode. Its 3-button gameplay makes it easy to learn, but hard to master.

WASD (Player 1)

Arrow Keys (Player 2)
